page.title: 07The Village Hall,OLD
page.content:
The Village Hall is being decorated this year.It is hoped it will become a focal point of village life and help foster a community spirit.At the moment it is used regularly by a {Mums {and Todlers }group and by the {Women's {Institute. }Whist Drives and Barn Dances are held there occasionally. The Youth Club folded recently through lack of support.
A committee has been set up to promote the use of the hall and attempt to make it an important meeting centre in the village as it once was.There are problems with this as most people in the village seek entertainment away from Old.
